steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"disfv","text":"To recover the plasmid, use a clean razor blade to cut out one of the circles containing your DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
